          Nature Walk at the Botanic Gardens
         
 Escape the heat by getting outside early in the shadiest parts of the Botanic Gardens, a beautiful 40-acre campus landmark with plants from around the world and a turtle pond. Meet others who want to destress in nature and move your body to start the day. 
 
Registration on  recreationregistration.ucr.edu 
 
 
 
  Wednesday, August 11 at 8:45am
           

          
            to  9:45am
